item.title: ETRN
item.description: score:-104 Chances: EQT’s acquisition of Equitrans Midstream for $5.5 billion unveils the CEO’s vision for AI-driven growth. Equitrans is the majority owner of a pipeline situated in one of the fastest growing AI data center hubs. The company’s water segment includes water pipelines, impoundment facilities, and pumping stations, which could signify stability and growth potential in the water infrastructure sector.
